data.title: On This Day in West Virginia History
data.meta_description:
The West Virginia Archives and History web site offers detailed information on the state's
history,
outlines the documents available in the State Archives, and provides assistance in conducting
genealogical research.
data.text:
On This Day

in West Virginia History...

On December 10, 1938, West Virginia native Pearl S. Buck was awarded the Nobel Prize for Literature for her book The Good Earth.

Learn more:
